amendment.description: To extend the trade adjustment assistance as in effect before the enactment of the Trade and Globalization Adjustment Assistance of 2009.

action.text: Amendment SA 625 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 633.

vote.text: Amendment SA 625, under the order of 9/20/2011, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 143.
